org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp

Class RenderingHintImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.RenderingHintImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderingHint

    public class RenderingHintImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements RenderingHint
    An implementation of the instance details interface with setters for the details.
